Content.Text:
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you are here to see Master Amir, he
is unfortunately indisposed at the
moment. If you have a message...
I came to see you, Sanjay

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My apologies. I thought you were here
to see the master.
<PAGE>
I never thought for a moment that you
might be here for me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Allow me to apologize by getting you a
drink. Do you have a little time?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry for keeping you waiting. Here is
some herbal tea.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't know what you like, Ms. <MYNAME>,
so I hope you'll forgive me for serving
you my personal favorite.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Ah, it seems that you like it. I'm glad.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Seeing you smiling over the herb tea
that I prepared for you, Ms. <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Well, it reminds me of just how warmly
everyone here in town has welcomed me.
<PAGE>
Let us continue to be good neighbors in
the future.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you very much for coming to see me
today. Allow me to walk you back home.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My sincerest apologies. I will let the
master know you were here, Ms. <MYNAME>.
